author: dndnerd1

text: The game is exceptionally well. The story is amazing and the battle system holds true to most old school role playing game turn based system. Of course, one of the most enjoyable thing about the game is the replay value. From the very end of the first chapter, you have the option of branching out towards different story lines or ending the game (note the earlier you end the game, the lower the ending you're going to get.) I would highly recommend this game for anyone who hasn't okay yet! ^_^
author: SoldierofDreamz

text: Wow! I've never played this game, and I'm blown away by this track. No nostalgia needed.
author: Sean Saunders

text: The ESRB is weird.  I see games get marked Teen for content that's far less "adult" than alot of the games they rate as Everyone.  I think that whoever does the ESRB ratings have something wrong with them.  Hell, look up "complete heart of darkness deaths".  Game's rated E, but some of the deaths are extremely brutal, like the main character getting his neck snapped.
